workflow: MISSION: 1. Login. 2. Navigate to PIM module and Add a new employee (FirstNameTest LastNameTest). 3. Click SAVE to finish onboarding. 4. Navigate to Admin module -> User Management -> Users. 5. Create a System User for the newly created employee. THE MISSION IS ONLY SUCCESSFUL IF ALL STEPS ARE COMPLETED.

trace.thought: The goal is to log in to the OrangeHRM platform. The current page is the login screen. I need to fill in the username and password fields and click the login button. According to the knowledge bank, I should ensure the page is fully loaded and the username input field is visible and enabled before filling the username field.
The current page is the login page. The goal is to first log in. I have already filled the username. Now I need to fill the password field.
I am on the login page and have already filled in the username and password. The next step is to click the login button to proceed to the dashboard. This addresses step 1 of the goal: Login.
I have successfully logged in. The next step is to navigate to the PIM module. I will use the 'PIM' link to navigate to the PIM module.

I am currently on the OrangeHRM Dashboard page, and I have successfully logged in. The next step in the goal is to navigate to the PIM module. I will click on the PIM link to navigate to the PIM module.
The goal is to add a new employee in the PIM module. I am currently on the Employee List page. Therefore, I need to click the 'Add' button to navigate to the 'Add Employee' page.

The goal is to add a new employee in the PIM module. I am currently on the Employee List page. Therefore, I need to click the 'Add' button to navigate to the 'Add Employee' page. The knowledge bank contains a proven locator for the 'Add' button on the EmployeeListPage.

I am currently on the 'Add Employee' page and need to fill in the employee details (First Name, Last Name) as per step 2 of the goal. Then I need to click the 'Save' button to complete step 3. I will start by filling the first name field.
I am currently on the 'Add Employee' page and have already filled in the first name. The next step is to fill in the last name, as per the goal description. I will use the 'Last Name' input field.

I am currently on the 'Add Employee' page and have already filled in the first name and last name. The next step is to click the 'Save' button to complete the onboarding process, as per step 3 of the goal. After saving, I expect to be redirected to the employee's personal details page or a confirmation message.

The goal is to add a new employee and then navigate to the Admin module to create a system user. I have already filled in the first name and last name and clicked the save button. Now I need to navigate to the Admin module. According to the knowledge bank, the 'Admin' link is a stable locator on the AddEmployeePage.

The goal is to create a System User for the newly created employee. I am currently on the Admin module -> User Management -> Users page. The next step is to click the 'Add' button to create a new user.

I am currently on the 'Add User' page, which is part of step 5 of the goal: 'Create a System User for the newly created employee'. I need to click the 'Save' button to complete this step.
